This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    1149131009Rai staging system for chronic lymphocytic leukemia (tumor staging)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/EVS/Thesaurus.owl
    CodeDisplay
    C141206Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia- Modified Rai Staging System

name: RaiStagingMethodVS
title: Rai Staging System Value Set
description: Rai Staging Systems used to stage chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL).
